page.title: 18A CLASS SURVEY
page.content: Class 4 is a class of 31 children aged 7 and 8 years,comprising 22 boys and 9 girls. Our work was centered on the children and their homes. {Homes.}All the children live in houses_26 in owner occupied and 5 in council houses.Most children live between 1.5 and 2 miles from the school(17),only 6 children live within 0.5 of a mile of the school,and the remaining 8 live from between 2 and 5 miles away. { Rest and Recreation}Most of the children sleep for 11 hours every night and in their leisure time the most popular past time is bicycle riding.Out of 31 children_22 have at least one pet animal. { Food}.The favourite meals of this age group usually contains chips and beans or is a roast dinner.
